scripts.td: npm run build-jsx && browserify js/main.js -d -o build/js/bundle.js && rm -rf js/components/**/*.js & rm -rf js/components/*.js
scripts.temptd: npm run build-jsx && browserify js/main.js -d -o build/js/bundle.js
scripts.deploy: uglifyjs build/js/bundle.js -o build/js/bundle.min.js && npm run build-css
scripts.build-css: npm run nsp-css && npm run min-selector-css
scripts.min-css: cat style/added-style.css style/treeview.css style/style.css style/raiting_table.css style/bootstrap.min.css | cleancss -o style/style.min.css
scripts.min-selector-css: cat style/added-style.css style/treeview.selector.css style/style.selector.css style/raiting_table.selector.css  style/bootstrap.min.css | cleancss -o style/style.min.css && rm -rf style/*selector.css
scripts.nsp-css: namespace-css style/raiting_table.css --selector #assessment_miratorg -o style/raiting_table.selector.css && namespace-css style/style.css --selector #assessment_miratorg -o style/style.selector.css && namespace-css style/treeview.css --selector #assessment_miratorg -o style/treeview.selector.css
